name: Caterpillar Adventure
description:
Caterpillar Adventure is a 2D Platformer where the player controls a caterpillar and a butterfly through a variety of levels filled with secrets. As the caterpillar you can run, jump, and dash, while as the butterfly you can run, jump, and fly your way through the platforming challenges.

This game was created using the Unity and Corgi Engine. Pixel art visuals were made in Aseprite while backgrounds and loading screens were done in Photoshop. 

Music and sounds done by the very talented Beatscribe on Fiverr. 

Beatscribe- Fivver

Game Length:

30 minutes to 45 minutes

I hope you enjoy Caterpillar Adventure! :) 

Caterpillar Adventure Full Playthrough

Bonus: Here is a version of the game with Xbox Controller Button Prompts
